servicedescription: Testwebservice with a Triple Store backend

datasets.query: SELECT ?wikidatacity ?wikidatacityLabel ?the_geom WHERE{ ?wikidatacity wdt:P31 wd:Q515 . ?wikidatacity wdt:P625 ?the_geom . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language '[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en'. } }
datasets.name: WikidataCity

datasets.query: SELECT ?namedplace ?rel ?val ?the_geom WHERE{ ?namedplace rdf:type gn:NamedPlace . ?namedplace ?rel ?val . OPTIONAL{?val geo:asWKT ?the_geom .} }
datasets.name: NamedPlace
